title: Season rewards
body: If someone was banned for 2 weeks do they still receive season rewards like the border icon etc

replies.body: As long as you aren't banned within 3 months of the season ending, you'll still be eligible for all rewards. We don't quite know exactly when this season will be ending yet though, so I can't say for sure how much time is left in this season.

They haven't announced anything about how season rewards will work yet so we don't know any of the requirements for this year but last season players who had bans in the 3 months before the end of the season were disqualified from ranked rewards.
